name: Fast Reverse Proxy (FRP)
description: Detects the use of Fast Reverse Proxy. frp is a fast reverse proxy to help you expose a local server behind a NAT or firewall to the Internet.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\frpc.exe OR *\\frps.exe) AND process.command_line:*\\frpc.ini*)`
